decision_conditions: The development as shown on the proposed plans shall be commenced within 3 months and completed in full within 6 months of the date of this permission. In the event that this is not complied with, this planning permission will lapse.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990 and to comply with the requirements of Enforcement Notice ref: 20EN0910 | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings: VC/237/P/05 REV A1: EXISTING REAR ELEVATION ; VC/237/P/04 REV A1: EXISTING FRONT ELEVATION ; VC/237/P/03 REV A1: EXISTING ROOF PLAN ; VC/237/P/02 REV A1: EXISTING FIRST FLOOR PLAN ; VC/237/P/06 REV A1: EXISTING FLANK ELEVATION- 1 ; VC/237/P/09 REV A1: PRE- EXISTING FIRST FLOOR PLAN ; VC/237/P/07 REV A1: EXISTING FLANK ELEVATION- 2 ; VC/237/P/08 REV A1: PRE- EXISTING GROUND FLOOR PLAN ; VC/237/P/10 REV A1: PRE- EXISTING ROOF PLAN ; VC/237/P/11 REV A1: PRE- EXISTING FRONT ELEVATION ; VC/237/P/14 REV A1: PRE- EXISTING FLANK ELEVATION- 2 ; VC/237/P/12 REV A1 : PRE- EXISTING REAR ELEVATION ; VC/237/P/13 REV A1: PRE- EXISTING FLANK ELEVATION- 1 ; VC/237/P/15 REV A1: PROPOSED FIRST FLOOR PLAN ; VC/237/P/16 REV A1: PROPOSED ROOF PLAN ; VC/237/P/17 REV A1: PROPOSED FRONT ELEVATION ; VC/237/P/19 REV A1: PROPOSED FLANK ELEVATION- 1; VC/237/P/18 REV A1: PROPOSED REAR ELEVATION; VC/237/P/20 REV A1: PROPOSED FLANK ELEVATION- 2; VC/237/P/01 REV A1: EXISTING GROUND FLOOR PLAN;
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.

| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings listed under condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
description: Demolition and re-construction of side garage and conversion into habitable space, along with associated external alterations and construction of front porch (part retrospective)
